entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow near the Cariboo mountains. Amount 5 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Fog patches in sheltered areas overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Fog patches in sheltered areas early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
